title.narrative: (VCO Outcome 2.1) An enabling legislative and policy environment in line with international standards on ending violence against women and girls and other forms of discrimination is in place and translated into action.

description.narrative: This oucome focuses on working the Minisry of Education and Training (MOET) and UNESCO, Farmer Association and civil society to scale up successful-school based violence prevention models, by advocating and technically supporting integration of these models into MOET’s national programme. It also upscales successful youth engagement to end discrimination and violence (“Change-Makers Initiative”) to reach out to their peers to challenge gender stereotypes and harmful social norms. It also pilots projects at provincial levels to promote positive social norms, respectful relationships and gender equality.
